name: Abdelkader Chaou
description: '''Abdelkader Chaou''' (born November 10, 1941, in the [[Casbah]] of [[Algiers]]) is an Algerian musician who is well known in Algeria for his own style of [[chaabi (Algeria)|chaabi]] music, both as a singer and a [[mondol]] virtuoso. He is considered important enough as a musician that he was recognized nationally at a tribute concert in 2013, an event that was a "tribute from his peers for a rich career."
